00088 #define IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBltFast(p,a,b,c,d,e)         ( ( gfDontUseDDBlits == TRUE ) ?  BltFastDDSurfaceUsingSoftware( p, a, b, c, d, e ) : ( IDirectDrawSurface2_BltFast(p,a,b,c,d,e) ) )
00089 #define IDirectDrawSurface2_SGPBlt(p,a,b,c,d,e)                                     ( ( gfDontUseDDBlits == TRUE ) ?  BltDDSurfaceUsingSoftware( p, a, b, c, d, e ) : ( IDirectDrawSurface2_Blt(p,a,b,c,d,e) ) )
